sections.heading: Subrogor and subrogeeAn incorporeal right to which a person has been subrogated, either conventionally or by effect of law, shall be enforced judicially by:(1) The subrogor and the subrogee, when the subrogation is partial; or(2) The subrogee, when the entire right is subrogated
sections.text: Subrogor and subrogeeAn incorporeal right to which a person has been subrogated, either conventionally or by effect of law, shall be enforced judicially by:(1) The subrogor and the subrogee, when the subrogation is partial; or(2) The subrogee, when the entire right is subrogated.
